verses.verse: And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> on his way, <S%H1870><s%> and the angels <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> met <S%H6293><s%> him.

And when <S%H834><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> them, he said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is God's <S%H430><s%> host: <S%H4264><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Mahanaim. <S%H4266><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him to Esau <S%H6215><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Seir, <S%H8165><s%> the country <S%H7704><s%> of Edom. <S%H123><s%>

And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> shall you speak <S%H559><s%> to my lord <S%H113><s%> Esau; <S%H6215><s%> Your servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> thus, <S%H3541><s%> I have sojourned <S%H1481><s%> with Laban, <S%H3837><s%> and stayed <S%H309><s%> there until <S%H5704><s%> now: <S%H6258><s%>

And I have <S%H1961><s%> oxen, <S%H7794><s%> and asses, <S%H2543><s%> flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and menservants, <S%H5650><s%> and womenservants: <S%H8198><s%> and I have sent <S%H7971><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> that I may find <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight. <S%H5869><s%>

And the messengers <S%H4397><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> We came <S%H935><s%> to your brother <S%H251><s%> Esau, <S%H6215><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> he comes <S%H1980><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> you, and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> with him.

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was greatly <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> and distressed: <S%H3334><s%> and he divided <S%H2673><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that was with him, and the flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and herds, <S%H1241><s%> and the camels, <S%H1581><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> bands; <S%H4264><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to the one <S%H259><s%> company, <S%H4264><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> it, then the other company <S%H4264><s%> which is left <S%H7604><s%> shall escape. <S%H6413><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> O God <S%H430><s%> of my father <S%H1><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> of my father <S%H1><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which said <S%H559><s%> to me, Return <S%H7725><s%> to your country, <S%H776><s%> and to your kindred, <S%H4138><s%> and I will deal well <S%H3190><s%> with you:

I am not worthy <S%H6994><s%> of the least <S%H6994><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the mercies, <S%H2617><s%> and of all <S%H3605><s%> the truth, <S%H571><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have showed <S%H6213><s%> to your servant; <S%H5650><s%> for with my staff <S%H4731><s%> I passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> I am become <S%H1961><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> bands. <S%H4264><s%>

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of my brother, <S%H251><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Esau: <S%H6215><s%> for I fear <S%H3373><s%> him, lest <S%H6435><s%> he will come <S%H935><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> me, and the mother <S%H517><s%> with the children. <S%H1121><s%>

And you said, <S%H559><s%> I will surely do you good, <S%H3190><s%> and make <S%H7760><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> as the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> which <S%H834><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> be numbered <S%H5608><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>

And he lodged <S%H3885><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> that same <S%H1931><s%> night; <S%H3915><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> of that which came <S%H935><s%> to his hand <S%H3027><s%> a present <S%H4503><s%> for Esau <S%H6215><s%> his brother; <S%H251><s%>
Two hundred <S%H3967><s%> she goats, <S%H5795><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> he goats, <S%H8495><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> ewes, <S%H7353><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%>

Thirty <S%H7970><s%> milk <S%H3243><s%> camels <S%H1581><s%> with their colts, <S%H1121><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> cows, <S%H6510><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> she asses, <S%H860><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> foals. <S%H5895><s%>

And he delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> every drove <S%H5739><s%> by themselves; <S%H905><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to his servants, <S%H5650><s%> Pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, and put <S%H7760><s%> a space <S%H7305><s%> between <S%H996><s%> drove <S%H5739><s%> and drove. <S%H5739><s%>

And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> the foremost, <S%H7223><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> meets <S%H6298><s%> you, and asks <S%H7592><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> Whose <S%H4310><s%> are you? and where <S%H575><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> you? and whose <S%H4310><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you?

Then you shall say, <S%H559><s%> They be your servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob's; <S%H3290><s%> it is a present <S%H4503><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to my lord <S%H113><s%> Esau: <S%H6215><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> he is behind <S%H310><s%> us.

And so <S%H1571><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> he the second, <S%H8145><s%> and the third, <S%H7992><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> the droves, <S%H5739><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> On this <S%H2088><s%> manner <S%H1697><s%> shall you speak <S%H1696><s%> to Esau, <S%H6215><s%> when you find <S%H4672><s%> him.

And say <S%H559><s%> you moreover, <S%H1571><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is behind <S%H310><s%> us. For he said, <S%H559><s%> I will appease <S%H3722><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him with the present <S%H4503><s%> that goes <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, and afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will see <S%H7200><s%> his face; <S%H6440><s%> peradventure <S%H194><s%> he will accept <S%H5375><s%> of me.

So went <S%H5674><s%> the present <S%H4503><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him: and himself <S%H1931><s%> lodged <S%H3885><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> in the company. <S%H4264><s%>

And he rose <S%H6965><s%> up that night, <S%H3915><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> wives, <S%H802><s%> and his two <S%H8147><s%> womenservants, <S%H8198><s%> and his eleven <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sons, <S%H3206><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the ford <S%H4569><s%> Jabbok. <S%H2999><s%>
And he took <S%H3947><s%> them, and sent <S%H5674><s%> them over <S%H5674><s%> the brook, <S%H5158><s%> and sent <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> that he had.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was left <S%H3498><s%> alone; <S%H905><s%> and there wrestled <S%H79><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> with him until <S%H5704><s%> the breaking <S%H5927><s%> of the day. <S%H7837><s%>

And when he saw <S%H7200><s%> that he prevailed <S%H3201><s%> not against him, he touched <S%H5060><s%> the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of his thigh; <S%H3409><s%> and the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> thigh <S%H3409><s%> was out of joint, <S%H3363><s%> as he wrestled <S%H79><s%> with him.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Let me go, <S%H7971><s%> for the day <S%H7837><s%> breaks. <S%H5927><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I will not let you go, <S%H7971><s%> except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> you bless <S%H1288><s%> me.
And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, What <S%H4100><s%> is your name? <S%H8034><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Your name <S%H8034><s%> shall be called <S%H559><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> but Israel: <S%H3478><s%> for as a prince have you power <S%H8280><s%> with God <S%H430><s%> and with men, <S%H582><s%> and have prevailed. <S%H3201><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> Tell <S%H5046><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, your name. <S%H8034><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> is it that you do ask <S%H7592><s%> after my name? <S%H8034><s%> And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> him there. <S%H8033><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Peniel: <S%H6439><s%> for I have seen <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face, <S%H6440><s%> and my life <S%H5315><s%> is preserved. <S%H5337><s%>
And as he passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Penuel <S%H6439><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> rose <S%H2224><s%> on him, and he halted <S%H6761><s%> on his thigh. <S%H3409><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> not of the sinew <S%H1517><s%> which shrank, <S%H5384><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of the thigh, <S%H3409><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he touched <S%H5060><s%> the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> thigh <S%H3409><s%> in the sinew <S%H1517><s%> that shrank. <S%H5384><s%>
